attributes.review:
Where do i even start 🙄🙄🙄 this app is horrible!! 🤬🤬!!!!!!!! when i downloaded this app i was already greeted with horrible app bugs. I also saw the words TRUMP 2020 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮 on my screen. literally disgusting. i have never been so unsatisfied with an app in my whole FREAKING LIFE 🤯😧😓. RRRROLL to my party 🎉 with my pretty pink wig 🐷💝👩🏼‍🎤! SOMETIMES I DONT WANNA BE HAPPY 😃 DONT HOLD IT AGAINST ME! anyways i cant believe some of the inappropriate merch that was PRESENTED in this app. Like defend the pigs. GROSS DEFUND THE PIGS 🐷. ANYWAYS SETTLE FOR BIDEN 2020 
sincerely melania trump 💝🥰😍

attributes.review: i rated this app a 1 because when i downloaded it, i teleported to the white house. while i was in the building that our amerikkkan president lived in i noticed that barron was all sad. he was in his room playing w a broken fidget spinner 😪😢i desperately wanted to get him out but before i could greet him, i teleported back to my house. barron is trump’s prisoner😯😳we must free him😃😉also trump looks like he smells like hot dog water so i think that’s another reason why we need to get him out of office and get rid of his app😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😼😼😼😼😼😼😼😼
attributes.title: free barron til it’s backwards 🤣😹🙂🤨

attributes.review: Wow I just got the app and already my eyes want to burn. When opening the app I’m greeted with some orange looking man that made me want to throw my phone. If I had I would have broken it and have to fix the hole in my wall. 😞This almost made me spend so much money on repairs. Now imagine if my eyes were to have actually burnt. So much more money spent on repairs. And that’s 🧚🏻‍♂️ not🧚🏻 fair🧚🏻 BEWARE you may actually have to repair your eyes from such a horror costing millions. And that’s only the beginning. Second it immediately wanted to get my personal information, putting me in ✨danger✨ Do not trust this horrid app with your information. Now, have a good day luv and stay safe.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I got this app and as soon as I got it it asked me to put on my phone number. Like ummmm not gonna frickin happen. That is ridiculous. I am only 17 and it wants to get me to vote. I am not legally allowed to so that is a crime. Then when I tried to delete the app it said if you delete me I will stop your phone from working. It did I am now typing this on my iPad. This app tried to steal my info it tried to get me to illegally vote and support a rapist and rude and disrespectful person. This app should be taken down. It is trying to influence uneducated people to do horrible wrong things. It is overall just a very bad app. DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL STEAL YOUR INFORMATION. AND THEN SPAM YOU WITH TEXTS AND NOTIFICATIONS.
attributes.title: Steals Your INFORMATION
